review: i love this thing.. sometimes if the strawberries are to big it squishes the ends of them and you have to figure out which way to put the berries in there so they don't smoosh the ends if they are a little big.  Works great tho.  Blades are sharp and cut right thru.  use mine all the time and blades are still sharp.
productTitle: Chef'n Strawberry Slicester Hand-Held Strawberry Slicer
